author: Honest Food
name: Salsa Negra
ingredients: 180ml cup sunflower, canola or vegetable oil
1 pasilla or guajillo chile, stemmed and seeded and torn up
1 ancho chile, stemmed and seeded and torn up
instructions: Puree all the ingredients on high in a blender until smooth.
Store in an airtight container in the fridge indefinitely.
